ltl2rabin

Class MojmirAutomatonFactory<F>

  • Object
    • ltl2rabin.AutomatonFactory<F,PropEquivalenceClass,Set<String>>
      • ltl2rabin.MojmirAutomatonFactory<F>
  • Type Parameters:
    F - The type of object that is used to create a MojmirAutomaton.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MojmirAutomatonFactoryFromFormula, MojmirAutomatonFactoryFromString

    public abstract class MojmirAutomatonFactory<F>
extends AutomatonFactory<F,PropEquivalenceClass,Set<String>>
    This class is the base class for Factories that create MojmirAutomaton objects. It provides the reach() method that explores the state space from a given initial state

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      MojmirAutomatonFactory(ImmutableSet<Set<String>> alphabet)

      protected Set<MojmirAutomaton.State<PropEquivalenceClass,Set<String>>> reach(MojmirAutomaton.State<PropEquivalenceClass,Set<String>> initialState, Set<Set<String>> alphabet)
      This method creates a complete state set starting from an initial state by reading all possible letters from any possible state.

      • reach

        protected Set<MojmirAutomaton.State<PropEquivalenceClass,Set<String>>> reach(MojmirAutomaton.State<PropEquivalenceClass,Set<String>> initialState,
                                                                             Set<Set<String>> alphabet)
        This method creates a complete state set starting from an initial state by reading all possible letters from any possible state.
        Parameters:
        initialState - The initial state, labelled with a PropEquivalenceClass that is the starting point for the unfolding of all possible formulas.
        alphabet - The alphabet used for the construction. All states in the result will have transitions for all letters from this alphabet.
        Returns:
        The (immutable) set of states.
